messages.subject: Spirit of Learning - Soul in Education conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hello dear listmates - I wanted to post and let this list know about my current and delighted involvement in this amazing event taking place on Kauai in
messages.messageBody:
Hello dear listmates -
I wanted to post and let this list know about my current and delighted
involvement in this amazing event taking place on Kauai in October of 2001.
It is a gathering of some of the folks on the leading edge of educational
thought and action. . . like Joseph Chilton Pearce, Peggy O'Mara, Jerry
Mintz, and many many more. SPIRIT OF LEARNING - SOUL IN EDUCATION The goal
is to explore and implement more soul-consciousness in education - holding
a vision of education imbued with human values, character, integrity and
creativity. I could go on and on! But, suffice it to say you all need to
check out the website link:
http://www.childrenbelieve.com/conference/spirit.htm
I'm thrilled to be involved with such a dynamic group! It is feeding my
soul on such a deep level. Maybe I'll see some of you here on Kauai in
October!
Sending much aloha,
Lee
North Country Farms
An Organic Family Farm & Tropical Bed and Breakfast
P.O. Box 723
Kilauea, HI 96754
http://www.skyfamily.com/northcountryfarms
